("HCR", the "Company" or the "Borrower") in order to support the expansion its current chain of three lodges to a total of ten lodges along the Gokyo Lakes Trail and Everest Base Camp Trail in the Khumbu/Everest region of Nepal. HCR has been operational since 1996 and owns and operates three lodges along the two trails.

name.narrative: table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } The Project is located along the Gokyo Lakes Trail and Everest Base Camp Trail in the Khumbu/Everest region of Nepal. HCR already owns and operates three lodges along the two trails and also owns land/lodges in 8 of the project sites namely Phakding, Dingboche, Gokyo, Dole, Machhermo, Namche, Khumjung, and Lebuche and will be leasing/ buying land in Lukla and Debuche. Currently the project sites are part of trekking routes in the Khumbu region not accessible by road transport, but will be accessible by road link from Kathmandu to Lukla (where tourists have to currently fly into to start the trek to the Khumbu region) via Jiri in a few years.
